author: T C
comment: Wants you to tap a tempo to set it. If I knew the exact tempo I wouldn't need this. It also has no pause or stop option so it's either running and on, or stopped and off. Very annoying to have to do that every time you stop and go back over a section.
title: Can't set specific tempo

author: Tyler F
comment: Like a stronger vibration and a flash of the screen to indicate the 1st beat of the bar. Otherwise very solid! Tap tempo is the best!
title: Could use 1st beat marker
